databaseaccess.interfaces

Interface IVideoReferenceDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockUpDAO, VideoReferenceDao

    public interface IVideoReferenceDao
    Database access object for videoreferences
    Author:
    Jorsi Grammens

    • Method Detail

      • addVideoReference

        int addVideoReference(int videoID,
                      int commentID,
                      VideoReference videoRef)
               throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                      ClassicNotFoundException
        Add a reference between a comment and video to the database.
        Parameters:
        videoID - ID of the video.
        commentID - ID of the comment.
        videoRef - The reference object between the video and the annotation.
        Returns:
        Id of the videoReference
        Throws:
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException
